## file.readJson() function

Read a file that contains JSON and turn it into an object

Note: no validation is done on the data. TODO: add validation of JSON to ensure it conforms to schema to type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function readJson<T>(path: string): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to the JSON file |
